description: Details of visibility splays pursuant to condition 16 of planning permission PP/2013/4061 dated 14/07/2015 for variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to allow for minor material amendments including alterations to the footprint and elevational layout of the building, the removal of the fifth floor and minor alterations to the form and bulk of the building, alterations to the fenestration design and internal alterations on all floors to application P/2009/3255 allowed on appeal (APP/A5270/A/11/2160093) dated 02/03/2012 as amended by non-material amendment permission PP/2013/2388 dated 27/06/13 for the redevelopment of site to provide a building of between two and six storeys in height comprising ground floor commercial floorspace with service yard and 26 flats above (4 x 1-Bed, 13 x 2-Bed, 7 x 3-Bed and 2 x 4-Bed units) including 12 affordable rent units, with communal / private amenity areas, roof terraces and balconies.
